Class MagicBridge

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.StaticBody
game.body.staticstructs.ground.GroundFrame
game.body.staticstructs.ground.magicCliffs.MagicBridge
public class MagicBridge extends GroundFrame
Level bridge between two GroundFrame instances.
Since:
25-03-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk
